name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 5th Birthday Live ＂DESTiNATiON -ちいさな心が行く先-＂【#AZKi生誕ライブ2023】 [e3JBtoh9pOQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Tokino Sora perform the song 'Scale the walls'.
MC section where AZKi and Sora thank the audience and each other.
Instrumental transition scene showing a silhouette of AZKi.
AZKi's monologue titled 'Root -α-', reflecting on her journey.
AZKi's monologue titled 'Root -β-', discussing her transition and growth.
AZKi's monologue titled 'Root -γ-', expressing gratitude and her future path.
Transition to the final song performance.
AZKi begins her performance of 'Endroll wa Owaranai'.

subtitles.original: 想像したら
subtitles.english: When I imagined it,

subtitles.original: 鼓動が聞こえたんだ
subtitles.english: I heard my heart beating.

subtitles.original: 作り込んだ道なんて
subtitles.english: Paths we have made,

subtitles.original: 全部従わず行こう
subtitles.english: let's go without following them at all.

subtitles.original: 響く音のまま
subtitles.english: Following the echoing sound,

subtitles.original: 心が赴くまま
subtitles.english: wherever my heart leads.

subtitles.original: ずっと君なら君なら
subtitles.english: With you, always with you,

subtitles.original: 一緒になんでも築ける
subtitles.english: we can build anything together.

subtitles.original: 躓いて視界が何も見えなくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if I stumble and my vision becomes unclear,

subtitles.original: 振り向いて笑えるそんな場所がある
subtitles.english: there's a place where I can look back and smile.

subtitles.original: ただ楽しもう
subtitles.english: Let's just have fun.

subtitles.original: 夢を散々掛け合わせ
subtitles.english: Mix our dreams together thoroughly,

subtitles.original: 時にそうそう間違って
subtitles.english: sometimes making mistakes along the way.

subtitles.original: それも Laugh laugh 気にせずに
subtitles.english: But Laugh laugh, without a care about that,

subtitles.original: 何度でも挑もう
subtitles.english: let's challenge it over and over.

subtitles.original: いつも Be yourself
subtitles.english: Always be yourself.

subtitles.original: 試さないとほら何も始まらない
subtitles.english: Look, nothing starts unless you try.

subtitles.original: 些細な勇気で明日を変えるまでもっと
subtitles.english: Until a little courage changes tomorrow, even more.

subtitles.original: 意味のない評価で世界比べないで
subtitles.english: Don't compare the world with meaningless evaluations.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい本音はすべてを包み込む太陽
subtitles.english: The true feelings I want to fulfill are a sun that envelops everything.

subtitles.original: いっそ好き放題上を目指して
subtitles.english: I'd rather aim for the top as I please,

subtitles.original: 立ちはだかる壁を登って
subtitles.english: and climb the walls that stand in my way.

subtitles.original: 刻んでいきたいな
subtitles.english: I want to engrave it.

subtitles.original: そして次に臨む越えたいあの未来
subtitles.english: And then, look towards the next future I want to surpass.

subtitles.original: 抱こう壮大な未来
subtitles.english: Let's embrace a grand future.

subtitles.original: そらちゃん今日はありがとう！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan, thank you for today!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！AZKiちゃん、おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Congratulations, AZKi-chan!

subtitles.original: ここまでの1,690日。
subtitles.english: 1,690 days up to this point.

subtitles.original: 初めの頃の私が歩いていた道は、
subtitles.english: The path I walked in the beginning

subtitles.original: いつも道標があって、
subtitles.english: always had a signpost,

subtitles.original: 分からないところでもちゃんと歩けてた。
subtitles.english: and I could walk properly even in places I didn't know.

subtitles.original: 雨の日も、風の日も、寒い日も、暑い日も、
subtitles.english: On rainy days, windy days, cold days, and hot days,

subtitles.original: 最初の地図に描かれた通りに歩いた。
subtitles.english: I walked according to what was drawn on the first map.

subtitles.original: 2枚目に渡された地図。
subtitles.english: The second map I was given...

subtitles.original: 真っ白だった。
subtitles.english: It was completely blank.

subtitles.original: いつも矢印の方向に進んでたから、
subtitles.english: Because I had always followed the arrows,

subtitles.original: 何も分からなくなった。
subtitles.english: I became lost.

subtitles.original: 頭も真っ白になったし、初めて「孤独」や「不安」を覚えた。
subtitles.english: My mind went blank too, and I felt 'loneliness' and 'anxiety' for the first time.

subtitles.original: 世界が怖かった。
subtitles.english: I was afraid of the world.

subtitles.original: それでも私なりに考えて、考えて考えて、
subtitles.english: Even so, I thought in my own way, I thought and thought,

subtitles.original: 初めて地図を作ることにした。
subtitles.english: and decided to make a map for the first time.

subtitles.original: きっとスローペースだったけど、
subtitles.english: It was surely at a slow pace,

subtitles.original: 描いているうちに何だか景色が色々見える様になった。
subtitles.english: but as I drew, I started to see various landscapes.

subtitles.original: 最初の地図に描かれていたゴールも飛び越えて、
subtitles.english: Surpassing the goal drawn on the first map,

subtitles.original: 今では道標なしでどこでもすぐに辿り着ける様になった。
subtitles.english: I can now reach anywhere instantly without a signpost.

subtitles.original: 成長だ。
subtitles.english: That's growth.

subtitles.original: そして今日、私は3枚目の地図へと進む。
subtitles.english: And today, I move on to the third map.

subtitles.original: たくさんやりたい事だらけで、まだまだ手探りだけど、
subtitles.english: I'm full of things I want to do, and I'm still feeling my way, but

subtitles.original: 今の私は一人じゃない。
subtitles.english: now I'm not alone.

subtitles.original: たくさんの開拓者のみんなが、ずっとそばにいてくれたことを、
subtitles.english: I feel strongly once again that all of you Pioneers

subtitles.original: 改めて強く感じてる。
subtitles.english: have been by my side all along.

subtitles.original: 新たな決意を持って、
subtitles.english: With a new determination,

subtitles.original: これからもみんなと一緒に、私は歌い続ける。
subtitles.english: I will continue to sing with everyone from now on.

subtitles.original: エンドロールは終わらない
subtitles.english: The Endroll Never Ends

subtitles.original: 扉の向こう繋いで 生まれたはずの世界は
subtitles.english: The world that should have been born by connecting beyond the door,

subtitles.original: 思うよりずっと難しくて 夢が零れた
subtitles.english: was much more difficult than I thought, and my dreams spilled over.
